text: niṅṅaḷentukeāṇṭ daivamārgattil yud'dhaṁ ceyyunnilla? mardditarāya puruṣanmārkkuṁ strīkaḷkkuṁ kuṭṭikaḷkkuṁ vēṇṭiyuṁ? avarēā iṅṅane prārthiccukeāṇṭirikkunnavarāṇ: "ñaṅṅaḷuṭe nāthā; marddakarāya janaṁ vilasunna ī nāṭṭil ninn ñaṅṅaḷe nī mēācippikkēṇamē. ninṟe pakkal ninn ñaṅṅaḷkk nī oru rakṣakane niścayiccutarēṇamē. ninṟe bhāgattu ninn ñaṅṅaḷkk oru sahāyiye nalkēṇamē.”
